Data: Sreesanth to Gilchrist, 2 runs runs first up, as Sreesanth splays it on the pads and Gilchrist tucks it into the gap at square leg for a couple, to some cheer from the crowd
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run back of a length this time but still on leg, Gilchrist cant beat midwicket
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run goes for a booming extra-cover drive, to an inviting one outside off stump, but fails to connect by some margin
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, FOUR runs gets some bat on that one, not timed to perfection but its into the gap at point and the ball runs away, remember the square boundaries are short in Adelaide
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run tidier delivery, back of a length and going across Gilchrist, who leaves
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run good delivery, hits a length and comes in and Gilchrist defends it back
Sharma to Hayden, no run hits a good length outside off and Hayden nearly inside-edges back onto his boot as he defends with an angled bat
Sharma to Hayden, no run good delivery, seaming across Hayden and getting some good lift too at 140ks and Hayden is beaten as he drives, one-handed
Sharma to Hayden, no run troubles him again with the angle, the ball going across him at pace and height and Hayden takes a hand off the bat as he initially goes fishing
Sharma to Hayden, no run this one's on the pads and Hayden flicks it to midwicket
Sharma to Hayden, no run goes across him again and he leaves this one go, comfortably
Sharma to Hayden, no run beaten from the crease as he plays at it, then takes a hand off the bat, to a ball shaping across him off a good length ... this is good bowling from the youngster
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run back of a length outside off and he pushes it to point, watchfully
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, FOUR runs good shot, an on-the-rise drive between two men at point, wasn't an overpitched delivery but Gilchrist made the room himself
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run good delivery, getting sharp lift off a very nice seam position, Gilchrist pokes and misses as the ball leaves him
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run this time he covers his off stump and leaves one on a good length
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, no run gets forward and drives on the up again, but straight to cover-point
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, FOUR runs smashed, as Gilchrist goes aerial past the man at short cover, just freed the arms and teed off very, very hard
Sharma to Hayden, 2 runs thats on the pads and Hayden's away, tucking to Harbhajan at midwicket
Sharma to Hayden, no run good length outside off stump and he leaves it alone
Sharma to Hayden, no run back of a length, good angle across Hayden, and he leaves it be
Sharma to Hayden, no run pitches outside leg and sits up, Hayden falls over in his attempted flick and Ishant does the fielding
Sharma to Hayden, no run goes chasing one and gets beaten, by that same lovely angle and bounce
Sharma to Hayden, 1 wide just strives for too much and bowls it very wide of off stump
Sharma to Hayden, no run back of a length on leg stump, seams away and he's squared up, the ball rolls to cover
Patel to Gilchrist, 1 run a loosener outside off, short and rising, Gilchrist chases it and the ball goes just over backward point and out to third man
Patel to Hayden, no run better stuff, back of a length outside off and its poked to backward point
Patel to Hayden, no run pitches outside off and straightens, Hayden gets across and shoulders arms
Patel to Hayden, SIX runs now where did that come from? Uff! Hayden just walks down the track and flays that with brute force rows back over deep midwicket
Patel to Hayden, no run back of a length on off stump, this time he gets in line and defends
Patel to Hayden, no run decent line, no room to work with and Hayden defends to cover
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run gets some lift from outside leg stump, the ball comes into Gilchrist's ribs and he defends it back to the bowler
Sharma to Gilchrist, (no ball) good short one again, but he's overstepped, Gilchrist defends to point and then walks off towards leg to figure out what to do with the free hit
Sharma to Gilchrist, no run doesn't do much in the and, not giving himself any room and digs out a well-directed delivery in the blockhole back to Ishant's left side
Sharma to Gilchrist, OUT first strike to India! Gilchrist doesn't move in his crease, just defending one that nips back in off a length and inside-edges back onto his stumps
Sharma to Ponting, no run good pace and bounce, rising outside off stump and Ponting leaves
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run thats too straight and Ponting works it towards square leg for one
Sharma to Hayden, no run good end to the over, forcing Hayden to defend to point
Patel to Ponting, no run back of a length just outside off and Ponting defends to point
Patel to Ponting, no run tidy delivery again, with good lift, and Ponting drops it at his feet
Patel to Ponting, no run much fuller, 138ks, comes back in and Ponting gets an inside-edge
Patel to Ponting, FOUR runs bang, thats four! Wasn't that short but Ponting pulls from outside off stump and smack through midwicket
Patel to Ponting, no run whats that now? Ponting shapes to sweep, sort of standing up, swinging across the line and copping the ball in the midriff ... Munaf appeals but that cannot be out
Patel to Ponting, no run slightly more orthodox defence, as he gets across and plays to midwicket
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run straighter one, get forward and pushes to mid-on, who's napping
Sharma to Ponting, 2 runs gets forward and pushes at one, on the up, picking the gap at point
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run good length ball, Ponting gets onto the front foot and drives to cover
Sharma to Hayden, 1 wide attempted bouncer goes down leg stump, and a wide called
Sharma to Hayden, no run short of a length, nips back in and Hayden has to defend it back
Sharma to Hayden, no run seams across from leg stump and Hayden pushes to the point fielder
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run sharp bounce into Hayden's ribs and he manages to tuck it out safely
Patel to Hayden, 1 run gets him back in his crease, defending along the ground wide of gully
Patel to Ponting, 1 run walks across his stumps and turns a straighter one to square leg
Patel to Hayden, no run thats back of a length outside off stump and Hayden shoulders arms
Patel to Hayden, no run gets forward and has to adjust his shot as the ball sits up, pushes to point
Patel to Hayden, 1 run gets across his stump to nudge a shorter delivery to midwicket, good running
Patel to Ponting, no run again he looks to get across but ends up defending one on leg to midwicket
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run digs in a short one to Hayden, who turns it away in the air to short fine leg
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run this one's fuller and Ponting drives expansively, getting an inside-edge to leg
Sharma to Hayden, no run back of a length and seaming across Hayden, who taps it back to Ishant
Sharma to Hayden, no run gets across to off stump, driving a length delivery to the man at cover
Sharma to Hayden, no run shorter one gets him on the back foot, cramping him into a defensive shot
Sharma to Hayden, no run good ball, good leave, as Hayden shoulders arms to one shaping across
Patel to Ponting, OUT and his poor form continues to haunt him! A short one bounces on him more than anticipated and he shapes to drive off the back foot, but the ball goes straight to Rohit at point
Patel to Clarke, no run back of a length on the stumps and he gets in line to defend it back
Patel to Clarke, no run hits a good length and he gets back to tap it back to Munaf again
Patel to Clarke, no run good lift and carry outside off stump, Clarke opts to leaves this one be
Patel to Clarke, no run marginally fuller length and he comes forward, driving to cover
Patel to Clarke, 2 runs pitches and straightens, Clarke pushes and gets a thick edge through gully
Pathan to Hayden, no run shortish one outside off, Hayden rides the bounce and plays to point
Pathan to Hayden, no run gets forward and drives a length ball, on the up, to the man at cover
Pathan to Hayden, OUT edged and gone! Pathan strikes quickly, defeating Hayden with extra bounce as he tries to cut one too close to the body, and the edge is snapped up by Dhoni
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run he's off the mark immediately, tucking one off the pads to square leg
Pathan to Clarke, no run pitches back of a length and forces Clarke to defend to midwicket
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run a touch too straight and Clarke tucks it off the hips to square leg for one
Patel to Clarke, no run short of a good length on the stumps and he opens the face, playing to point
Patel to Clarke, no run tidy stuff, 135ks, good lift off the track as Clarke gets back and defends
Patel to Clarke, no run 134ks, a bit fuller and he gets an inside-edge to leg after defending
Patel to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length and gets a nervy Clarke defending to cover
Patel to Clarke, no run 134ks, hits a length and goes away and Clarke judges well, opting to shoulder arms even though his front foot wasn't to the pitch
Patel to Clarke, no run thats a maiden as Munaf again hits a length and Clarke defends to the fielder
Pathan to Symonds, no run good length on off stump, Symonds stands his ground and defends to cover
Pathan to Symonds, no run extra bounce gets Symonds leaving the ball just in time, and Dhoni takes
Pathan to Symonds, no run pushes this one across him and he leaves it be off the front foot
Pathan to Symonds, no run gets this one to nip back in and Symonds, squared up, runs it to point
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run good single, Symonds defending another one that comes back in, with soft hands to point, and Clarke pushes for the run
Pathan to Clarke, no run a touch too short and Clarke gets onto the back foot, driving to extra cover
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 run back of a length outside off, chopped with an angled bat towards gully
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run much fuller, Clarke drives well but Uthappa, at short cover, dives to stop it
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run this one's shorter and seaming away, Clarke chases with absolutely no movement of the feet and gets beaten
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run 137ks, a touch too straight and Clarke drives to mid-on, running hard
Sreesanth to Symonds, no run 138ks, comes back in off a length but Symonds opts to leave it be
Sreesanth to Symonds, no run comes in again from off and he presents a full face back to the bowler
Sharma to Clarke, 1 wide 139ks, good bounce outside off stump, Clarke leaves it be
Sharma to Clarke, 1 run comes forward to a fuller one and drives to cover, where Gambhir dives to his right and takes some pace off the shot with one hand and Yuvraj does the cleaning up at mid-off
Sharma to Symonds, no run good carry from a shorter one, it comes in to Symonds, who leaves
Sharma to Symonds, no run gets forward and pushes one to cover, who stops it

Sharma to Symonds, OUT another one bites the dust! Symonds tries to steer one just too close to the body, as it comes back in at extra height, and the ball goes nowhere but into gully's hands ... a superb decision to bring Ishant back for the first over of the final Powerplay
Sharma to Hussey, no run sits up again, he gets forward and defends to point, watchfully
Sharma to Hussey, 1 leg bye gets up and plays one around the corner, for a single, Dhoni fields
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run a touch too full and Hussey steers it wide of backward point for one
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run gets forward and leaves a good-length delivery wide of off stump
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run this time he decides to push the ball to extra cover, but cant beat the man
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run sees the shorter length and drives on the up, but Uthappa dives at cover and saves certain runs, good stop there
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run flashes hard at this one, off the back foot, and finds the gap at cover-point
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run pitches on a good length and Hussey square-drives to Gambhir at point
Sharma to Clarke, no run short of a length, good lift off the surface and Clarke leaves it be
Sharma to Clarke, no run this one moves in off a short length but Clarke can afford to leave again
Sharma to Clarke, no run nagging, outside-the-off channel and Clarke has to leave it once more

Sharma to Clarke, FOUR runs thats marginally full and Clarke drives to Pathan at mid-off, who commits an absolute blunder - I'm talking needless dive and nice gap through the hands - to allow the batsman a four down the ground
Sharma to Clarke, no run the response is a short-of-a-length ball and Clarke goes back to leaving
Sharma to Clarke, 1 run gets onto the front foot and runs one wide of Gambhir at backward point
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run hits a length and straightens, Clarke gets forward and shoulders arms
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run 138ks, sharp one sits up and surprises Clarke, who does well to ride the bounce and drop the ball in front of midwicket for a sharp single
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run tight line, getting Hussey back in the crease and defending it back
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run thats a good length on off stump and he defends watchfully to cover
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run 143ks, good length outside off and he gets bat and pad together
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run hint of movement through the air, full length, Hussey blocks it out to point
Pathan to Clarke, no run good length on middle and off, patiently pushed back to Pathan
Pathan to Clarke, no run this one nips back and Clarke gets an inside-edge to cover as he drives
Pathan to Clarke, no run seams across Clarke, pretty wide too, and he watches it through to Dhoni
Pathan to Clarke, no run touch too straight, Clarke drives off the pads, but again cant beat midwicket
Pathan to Clarke, no run bouncer this time over the stumps, forcing Clarke to duck under it
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run strays onto leg stump and Clarke tucks it away for a single to end the over
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run good length outside off stump, comes onto the front foot and pushes to point
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run bowls a good length just outside off and Hussey patiently defends to cover
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run back of a length this time and he leaves it be, pretty close to the body, too
Sreesanth to Hussey, 3 runs too wide and he jams bat down on it, piercing the gap at point for a triple
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run walks across the stumps and flicks a full one to a diving midwicket fielder
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run this one's driven straight through Sreesanth's legs but mid-off fields
Pathan to Hussey, no run hits a good length outside off stump and Hussey shoulders arms
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length, with some good carry, as Hussey again leaves alone
Pathan to Hussey, no run back of a length, Hussey leaves, Dhoni collects and flings it to cover
Pathan to Hussey, no run slower one, a touch fuller and wider but again Hussey wants to leave it be
Pathan to Hussey, 1 leg bye pitches down leg, Hussey shuffles across and dabs it to square leg, calling immediately for the sharp single ... Pathan raises his arms in frustration
Pathan to Clarke, FOUR runs now thats timed well, as Clarke pounces on the short one and slaps it nicely through the covers for four ... this time Pathan puts hands to hips and walks off
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run 133ks, nips in off a good length and Hussey pushes into the covers
Sreesanth to Clarke, no run back of a length outside off and Clarke gets forward, only to leave it be
Sreesanth to Clarke, 1 run too full down leg stump and he clips off the boot to backward square leg
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run full outside off, Hussey advances and drives to Raina, the sub, at cover
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run hits a fullish length and nips in, Hussey defends comfortably to point
Sreesanth to Hussey, no run bowls a good length and Hussey drives to cover, but straight to Raina
Pathan to Clarke, 1 wide thats a wide, just going across a bit too much
Pathan to Clarke, no run uses his feet and drives a good-length ball to extra cover, timed but not placed
Pathan to Clarke, no run gets across to a length ball and defends it watchfully
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run gets some extra width and punches off the back foot out to cover sweeper

Pathan to Hussey, OUT edged and taken! Pathan gets his second, striving for swing and inviting Hussey into a drive outside off stump, he succeeds in getting movement in the air and off the pitch and the thin edge is gleefully accepted by Dhoni
Pathan to Hopes, FOUR runs thats a gift, well outside leg stump and Hopes clips superbly down to fine leg
Pathan to Hopes, no run thats a length on off stump, he gets forward and drives to mid-off
Patel to Clarke, no run back of a length outside off and its driven towards backward point
Patel to Clarke, no run a touch short again and he drives off the back foot, but to the fielders
Patel to Clarke, no run straighter one, Clarke works it across the line, uppishly, to midwicket
Patel to Clarke, 1 run full on off stump, wristily flicked to the man at midwicket, and he gets one now
Patel to Hopes, 1 run flashes at one off the back foot, steering just wide of backward point
Patel to Clarke, no run gets on top of a length delivery and drives hard to extra cover, but no run
Pathan to Hopes, 3 runs good, positive shot to a full delivery on off stump, Hopes driving straight back past Pathan's outstretched left and mid-off is sloppy, so they run hard and get three
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run just short of a length outside off stump and Clarke punches in the air, past a diving short cover, and Ishant covers up from mid-off
Pathan to Hopes, 1 wide thats a needless one, short over leg stump and called wide for height
Pathan to Hopes, 1 run pitches well outside leg stump, Hopes tucks if out to deep backward square
Pathan to Clarke, 2 runs slower ball, full on off stump, flicked past square leg for a well-run two
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run back of a length but a touch wide and Clarke pushes into the covers for one
Pathan to Hopes, 1 run thats too short and wide and Hopes gets over it, cutting wide of point
Harbhajan to Hopes, 1 run thats a ripper, kicking off sharply from off stump and trapping Hopes deep in the crease, deflection off the pads and it runs fine
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on leg stump and Clarke nudges it towards square leg
Harbhajan to Hopes, 1 run flat one, gets a firm stride in and works it around the corner for one
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run tossed up on off stump, he makes room and cuts to backward point
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run flatter one, spins down leg stump and Clarke tucks it to square leg
Harbhajan to Clarke, FOUR runs full and flat and Clarke smashes it through a diving extra cover for four, lovely shot to end the over

Patel to Hopes, 1 run short of a length on off stump, Hopes gets forward, then back, and pushes to point, calls for the run and there's a chance for a run out but Munaf fails to get back to the stumps to collect ... had he been there, it would've been dicy
Patel to Clarke, no run slower ball, on a good length and Clarke defends watchfully to cover
Patel to Clarke, no run good length outside off and he drives to short cover this time
Patel to Clarke, no run gets over a short one and punches off the back foot, but straight to cover
Patel to Clarke, 1 run shorter one on off, he opens the face and guides it into the gap at point
Patel to Hopes, FOUR runs short, wide and cut hard in the air wide of backward point for four
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 wide spins down leg stump, Dhoni collects and thats wide
Harbhajan to Clarke, FOUR runs thats a shot! Clarke uses his feet and makes room for himself, then drives hard and inside-out over extra cover for a one-bounce four
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run flat one down leg stump, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
Harbhajan to Hopes, no run shuffles across to off, Harbhajan fires it flat, Hopes tucks to square leg
Harbhajan to Hopes, 1 run tosses it up outside off, Hopes gets across and dabs it wide of point
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run gives it some air on middle and off, he gets well forward and smothers it
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run fractionally short on leg stump and he pulls out to deep square leg
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run flat on leg stump, he shuffles and tucks it into the gap at midwicket for one
Yuvraj to Hopes, no run tossed up on off stump and its driven back to his right side
Yuvraj to Hopes, no run touch flatter and he drives it hard to Uthappa at short extra cover
Yuvraj to Hopes, no run slower one, tossed up outside off stump and Hopes defends
Yuvraj to Hopes, 1 run flat outside off stump, Hopes drives towards mid-off and sets off for one
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run looped up outside off stump, Clarke defends watchfully to end the over
Harbhajan to Hopes, no run tossed up, drifts into middle and leg, Hopes works it off the pads to leg

Harbhajan to Hopes, OUT thats lovely teamwork! Harbhajan tosses up the doosra, Hopes doesn't pick it all as he advances out of his crease, the ball goes on past his bat and Dhoni completes an easy stumping .. and Australia have slipped even further into a hole
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run tossed up on leg stump, he firmly gets bat and pad together in defence
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run tosses it up outside leg, raps Hogg on on the flap of the knee roll
Harbhajan to Hogg, 1 run flatter one outside off stump, Hogg uses his feet and drives to deep cover
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run full and flat down leg stump and Clarke clips out to deep midwicket
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run tossed up outside off, Clarke waits for it to spin and then pushes to point
Yuvraj to Hogg, no run tossed up on off stump, driven with an inside-edge to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hogg, 1 run tossed up wider, he gets back and drives into the covers
Yuvraj to Clarke, 2 runs touch too wide and Clarke makes room, cutting past point for two
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run flatter one on off stump, Clarke shuffles and works it across the line
Yuvraj to Hogg, no run tossed up on a length and Hogg pushes tentatively to the cover fielder
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run flat on middle and off, spins in and Clarke nudges to midwicket for one
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run shorter one, spins wide and Hogg chases, but cant beat the man at slip
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run 81ks, pushed across him wider and he leaves this one be
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run quicker and flatter outside off stump, he drives and inside-edges
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run gives it some flight outside off and Hogg drives to cover this time
Harbhajan to Hogg, 1 run too short and Hogg cuts through the gap at point for a single to keep strike
Yuvraj to Hogg, no run tossed up on off stump, he shuffles across and drives to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hogg, no run holds back the length a touch and Hogg plays it back towards Yuvraj
Yuvraj to Hogg, 1 run flat one on off stump, he drives across the line for a quick single
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run looped up outside off stump, Clarke gets forward and defends
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run thats a quicker one, short outside off and Clarke misses out on the cut
Yuvraj to Clarke, 2 runs quick and flat on the stump, Clarke gets in line and turns it past midwicket
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run flat across off stump, pushed to point and he gets sent back by Clarke
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run flat on off stump, Hogg makes room to leg and ends up pushing it back
Harbhajan to Hogg, 1 run low full toss outside off stump is slashed wide of backward point for one
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run spins down middle stump and pins him back in his crease, defending
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run topspinner, goes on and Clarke picks it, getting back and pushing to point
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run walks across his stumps and pats a flatter one to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hogg, 1 run touch too short outside off stump and Hogg cuts it wide of backward point
Yuvraj to Clarke, FOUR runs heavy heave across the line to bring up a hard-earned fifty, as Clarke gets down and swipes a flat one over midwicket
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, he rocks back and punches into the covers
Yuvraj to Hogg, 1 run slower one, still flat outside off stump, Hogg drives it to point for one
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run too short again, Clarke gets onto the back foot and drives wide of point
Yuvraj to Hogg, FOUR runs again just too short and Hogg pounces on it, flaying it through a diving gully and the ball just manages to trickle over the third man ropes
Pathan to Clarke, OUT gone! Clarke goes pulling a slower delivery, short though it was, straight down the throat of a well-positioned Ishant at deep midwicket
Pathan to Bracken, no run almost another run out, as Bracken pushes one to gully, Johnson sets off but has to retract his paces and dive back inside
Pathan to Bracken, no run beaten, as Pathan uses a good angle to work it across Bracken
Pathan to Bracken, no run swing and a miss! Bracken tries to go downtown but cannot connect
Pathan to Bracken, OUT and thats another, as Pathan works that channel to suck Bracken into a loose drive outside off stump, good outswinger, and Dhoni dives to his right to hold the thick edge
Pathan to Clark, no run he drives loosely and misses, so Pathan will have to stay at four for now
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run tossed up, he drives in the air but in bounces in front of cover
Harbhajan to Johnson, no run well bowled, very full and flat and Johnson drives it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Johnson, 1 run low full toss, Johnson uses his feet and drives down to long-on
Harbhajan to Clark, 1 run gives it some air outside off and Clark runs it past Dhoni to third man
Harbhajan to Johnson, 1 run full and pretty wide, Johnson heaves at it and edges into the ground at gully
Harbhajan to Clark, 1 run full and flat on the stumps and Clark clips it to midwicket for one
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run touch too short, Clarke sees it and backs away, cutting into the covers
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run tossed up on middle and leg, good bounce, Hogg pats it back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Hogg, no run tossed up outside off and Hogg patiently defends to cover
Harbhajan to Hogg, 1 run flat on leg stump, Hogg works it into the gap for a single
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run slower one, holds back the length and Clarke checks the shot to cover
Harbhajan to Clarke, 3 runs short and wide, he makes room and carves wide of gully and Munaf is, as always, sluggish to get to the ball at third man and they run three
Sharma to Clarke, (no ball) he oversteps, bowls it wide and Clarke pushes into the covers and we have another free hit coming up
Sharma to Clarke, FOUR runs thats how you deal with them! Clarke makes room and slashes over extra cover and right into the gap ... are we onto something big from Clarke?
Sharma to Clarke, 1 run slower and straighter, he shuffles and drives past midwicket this time
Sharma to Hogg, 1 run drives one off a good length into the gap at cover and point, well hit
Sharma to Clarke, no run gets tall and drives a length delivery into the covers, but the fielder is sharp
Sharma to Clarke, 1 run too straight and Clarke raises the 150 with a clip to square leg
Sharma to Hogg, no run full and straight again, he gets back and pushes it to Ishant's right
Pathan to Clark, 2 runs too full and wide as he strives for swing and Clark square-drives for two
Pathan to Clark, 1 run walks across to off before the ball is bowled and pushes to point
Pathan to Johnson, 1 run full and straight, change of pace too, and Johnson drives to long-on
Pathan to Clark, 1 run bowls a length outside off, Clark gets across and dabs it past gully
Pathan to Johnson, 2 runs full on the stumps, swings in and Johnson clips out to deep square leg
Pathan to Johnson, 1 run and he almost gets five, slipping in a slower one that Johnson inside-edges back onto his back leg before he scampers a single
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run full on the stumps and its heaved out to deep midwicket, raising the 200
Sharma to Clark, no run tries to make room and then swings at a length ball just over off stump, but cannot make any contact ... a crucial dot ball
Sharma to Clark, 1 run backs away to leg stump, Ishant bowls it slow and wide, then Clark has to adjust and reach out, slapping it in the air down to third man
Sharma to Johnson, no run now Johnson gives him the charge so he holds back the length to beat him
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run full and straight outside off stump, Johnson gets the toe end of the bat on it and scampers a single into the covers
Sharma to Clark, 1 run full on the stumps and Clark drives into the covers for one

So that single takes Australia to 203, an effort that came down to a handy partnership from Clarke and Hogg. Its been India's day so far, led once again by their seam bowlers. Ishant again caused early tremors and Pathan showed how crafty he can be in one-day cricket, reverse-swinging it to

Welcome back for the second innings. India need 204 to beat the world champions. Gautam Gambhir will open the innings with Sachin Tendulkar, in Virender Sehwag's absence. Brett Lee is not around but India cannot afford to relax. Nathan Bracken will start proceedings. Two slips in place.
Bracken to Gambhir, no run full and swinging already and Gambhir plays a punchy shot to point
Bracken to Gambhir, no run back of a length outside off stump and Gambhir shoulders arms
Bracken to Gambhir, no run sees some width and square-drives on the rise but can't beat point
Bracken to Gambhir, 2 runs makes some room for himself, walking down the track to drive through extra cover, its not timed to perfection but he gets two
Bracken to Gambhir, no run 134ks, just back of a good length and Gambhir pokes to point
Bracken to Gambhir, 2 runs some width there and Gambhir cracks a flashy drive through backward point and out to the fielder running around from third man
Clark to Tendulkar, no run bit of swing first up and Tendulkar eases the ball to point
Clark to Tendulkar, no run that swings away sharply off a length, across the breeze, and its left alone
Clark to Tendulkar, no run firm push into the covers, to a fullish one, but can't beat the fielders
Clark to Tendulkar, no run gets his foot forward and then shoulders arms, as the ball carries on
Clark to Tendulkar, no run thats quicker, 139ks and lifting outside off, for Tendulkar to leave
Clark to Tendulkar, no run sharp one zips in from leg stump to catch him high on the flap as he hops
Bracken to Gambhir, no run comes dancing down but can't put a full one away past mid-on
Bracken to Gambhir, no run sharper line, coming back in at 137ks and Gambhir defends
Bracken to Gambhir, FOUR runs short and wide and slashed over where third slip would have been, it lands safely and disturbs some seagulls chilling at third man
Bracken to Gambhir, 1 run nips back into him off a length but he rolls the wrists, working to square leg
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run thats about 134ks and swinging, Tendulkar gently defends it back
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run holds back the length and shapes it across Tendulkar, who is beaten
Clark to Gambhir, FOUR runs strays outside leg stump and Gambhir helps it on its way to fine leg, where the fielder was very square, and again he scatters seagulls down there
Clark to Gambhir, no run this one's angled wide of off stump and Gambhir can't get to it
Clark to Gambhir, 1 wide pitches outside leg stump and swings away sharply, wide called
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run again outside leg stump, this time Gambhir nudges to midwicket for one
Clark to Tendulkar, no run tucks him up on leg stump and he works it straight to midwicket
Clark to Tendulkar, no run a touch fuller, with a hint of swing, and this time he works it square leg
Clark to Tendulkar, 1 run and he's off the mark, cutting a short one to the right of backward point

Bracken to Tendulkar, FOUR runs edged and it goes smack between first slip and wicketkeeper, would you believe! Bracken sucked Tendulkar into a tame shot, a perfect edge, but neither Hayden not Gilchrist moved!
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run back of a length outside off and he leaves this one be
Bracken to Tendulkar, no run again he causes him trouble with that nagging length, forcing him to push down the wrong line and miss it all ends up
Bracken to Pathan, no run left alone outside off
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run outside off and moving away, lunging to the ball, thick outside edge trickles to third man for a single
Clark to Pathan, no run short of a length, probing outside off and going away from the left-hander, wafts and misses, loose shot there
Clark to Pathan, no run full and swinging into the left-hander, 130kph, dug out and deflects onto his legs
Clark to Pathan, no run slightly short, outside off, moving away, shoulders arms this time
Clark to Pathan, 1 run short again, outside off and Pathan jabs it towards point for a single, well in the gap that time
Clark to Gambhir, no run on the pads this time, Gambhir cramped for room, can't get it away, stifled appeal for lbw but that was going down leg
Clark to Gambhir, no run full and outside off, swinging a shade in, thick inside edge onto the leg side, Gambhir lets out a grunt, he knew that was in the slot for a cover-drive
Bracken to Pathan, no run driven confidently to cover
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run full and into middle stump, 136.5kph, nudged away to the leg side

Bracken to Gambhir, 3 runs short of a length, Gambhir tries to jab it to the off side but can only manage a thick inside edge down to third man, that was played away from the body and could have easily gone onto the stumps, vacant fine-leg region, though, and they get three
Bracken to Pathan, no run punched off the back foot, they think of a single but Symonds pulls off a fine save at cover
Bracken to Pathan, no run short of a length, pushed down the ground to mid-off
Bracken to Pathan, no run short of a length and outside off, another loose flash outside off and Pathan can't make contact again
Clark to Gambhir, 1 wide back of a length and moving too much outside off, wide is the call
Clark to Gambhir, no run hits a tighter length and Gambhir defends towards cover
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run dances down and looks to go over mid-on but gets a thick edge wide of gully
Clark to Pathan, no run goes for a booming drive outside off stump, beaten by a mile
Clark to Pathan, no run lovely seam, 136.6ks, sits up sharply and Pathan misses again
Clark to Pathan, no run third ball in a row Pathan plays and misses, reaching out too wide
Clark to Pathan, no run this time he gets forward and shoulders arms, wisely
Bracken to Gambhir, no run comes back in off a length and Gambhir confidently leaves it be
Bracken to Gambhir, no run nips in again, this time from off stump, and Gambhir pokes to point
Bracken to Gambhir, no run touch too short but not enough to cut freely and he chops to point
Bracken to Gambhir, no run short of a length again, very tidy, and Gambhir cannot beat gully this time
Bracken to Gambhir, 1 run this time he manages to dab it wide of gully and gets a single
Bracken to Pathan, no run touch too short and Pathan clubs it into the ground with loads of bottom hand
Clark to Gambhir, no run tries to create room and cuts, but misses the shorter ball outside off
Clark to Gambhir, no run hits the seam and goes away, Gambhir judges it and shoulders arms
Clark to Gambhir, no run sits up outside off stump and he tries to uppercut, but again misses out
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run good single, simply dabbed into the covers and well called for
Clark to Pathan, FOUR runs fraction short and wide and Pathan cracks it through point for four
Clark to Pathan, no run now he goes for a pull shot but misses as the ball gains on him rapidly
Johnson to Gambhir, no run short and wide, cracked hard but to Clarke at backward point
Johnson to Gambhir, 1 run short of a length again, he gets across and runs it towards gully
Johnson to Pathan, no run good length, seam up, Pathan defends with an inside-edge to midwicket
Johnson to Pathan, no run yorker down leg stump, thuds into Pathan's boot as he tries to flick, there's no swing on that ball, umpire Parker doesn't think it would have hit leg stump
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run gets over a good-length ball and drives into the covers for a quick single
Johnson to Gambhir, 2 runs gets some width and gives it the kitchen sink, slashing over backward point and out to the sweeper, Hopes, who slides and cuts them to two
Clark to Pathan, FOUR runs there's a shot! Pathan crunches it on the up, coming forward, through point
Clark to Pathan, no run driven on the up again, but straight to the man at cover
Clark to Pathan, 2 wide slides down leg stump, Gilchrist dives but fumbles and wide is called
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run slower one, 123ks, played with soft hands wide of gully for one
Clark to Pathan, no run makes some room and drives a fuller one straight to Symonds at cover
Clark to Pathan, 1 run slides down leg stump, Pathan turns it into the gap at midwicket
Clark to Gambhir, 2 runs greets the half-volley with an on-the-up steer through point, for a couple
Johnson to Pathan, no run hits a good length and its driven back to the left of Johnson, who fields
Johnson to Pathan, no run sits up off a wider angle and Pathan cuts to the man at point
Johnson to Pathan, 1 run a touch fuller and Pathan drives nicely into the covers, Hogg dives at mid-off and saves runs with a good stop
Johnson to Gambhir, no run marginally short and he brings the bat down hard, cutting to an athletic Clarke at point
Johnson to Gambhir, no run slower ball outside off stump, 132ks, stops on him and he drags the offcutter across the line towards midwicket, early into the shot
Johnson to Gambhir, 1 leg bye that'll be the 50, as Pathan works one off the pads to the gap behind square
Hopes to Gambhir, no run back of a length on the stumps, he gets across and plays it back
Hopes to Gambhir, FOUR runs short one on the stumps and he plays a pull, not perfect at all, but its up and into the gap at deep midwicket
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run this one slants across him and he dabs, with soft hands, past gully
Hopes to Pathan, no run lovely seam position there, sitting up and beating his bat as he drives
Hopes to Rohit Sharma, no run short of a length, 138ks, and he defends loosely outside off stump
Johnson to Gambhir, 2 runs hits a good length, he pushes it to extra cover, where there's a misfield, and Rohit calls for the second against Hogg's throw
Johnson to Gambhir, no run slower ball outside off stump, stops on him and he drives loosely to mid-on
Johnson to Gambhir, 1 run back of a length and seaming in, Gambhir opens the face and runs it fine
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run well played, rising to counter the bounce and then steering it through a diving Clarke at backward point, for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run fullish delivery on off stump and he gets in line, driving back to the bowler

Hopes to Rohit Sharma, OUT and another one bites the dust! Hopes gets a second in quick time as Rohit plays the poorest of leaden-footed drives to one shaping away from the body and edges a regulation take to Gilchrist, cuing celebrations around the ground
Hopes to Dhoni, no run good length outside off stump and Dhoni pushes it straight to cover
Hopes to Dhoni, no run back of a length outside off stump, he has a look and leaves it alone
Hopes to Dhoni, no run straightens off a short length and Dhoni compactly defends to cover
Hopes to Dhoni, no run good bouncer, 138.7ks and that zips past Dhoni's shoulder, forcing him up in the air, aggression from Hopes, at good pace!
Hopes to Dhoni, no run another short one gets Dhoni hopping and leaving outside off stump
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run back of a length on off stump, pushed to Symonds at point this time
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run fuller outside off stump, he tentatively pushes forward to cover
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets across and shoulders arms
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run well bowled, a 142k-yorker and he jams bat down in time
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run full toss on the pads and he whips that out to deep backward square
Johnson to Dhoni, 2 runs pitches on leg and straightens, Dhoni tucks it out to deep fine leg and hustles for the second, really pushing Yuvraj on that occasion
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run tidy line, about leg stump and rising, and Yuvraj pushes it back to Hopes
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run nips across him this time and he gets right in line, defending it back
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run back of a good length, he gets across to off stump and pushes to cover
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run slower ball, full outside off stump and he plonks it to the man at point
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run shapes this one across Yuvraj, who has a look-see and decides to leave
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run fraction short and he drives off the back foot to Symonds at cover
Johnson to Dhoni, no run inches forward and drives a good-length delivery into the covers
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run reaches out and plays a wristy cover-drive through point for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run fuller one outside off, he opens the face and steers to Hussey at cover
Johnson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs thats a perfect bouncer, very fast, and sucking Yuvraj into the air but he survives as the thick outside-edge flies in the gap between Gilchrist and second slip
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run full on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, 2 runs drives a wide half-volley through the covers and out to Symonds in the deep
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run gets tall and drives off the back foot to the man at cover
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run thats a fuller length and Yuvraj watchfully defends to Clarke at point
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run beaten! Yuvraj's feet don't move as he flirts outside off stump, poor shot
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run firm back-foot punch but straight to Hussey in the covers
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run gets right across to off and drives off the back foot, down to mid-off
Hopes to Yuvraj, no run full one as Hopes looks for swing, square-driven off the front foot to point
Johnson to Dhoni, no run 142ks, back of a length outside off and Dhoni pokes it to point
Johnson to Dhoni, no run reaches out and drives a full one to Hopes, doing duty at extra cover
Johnson to Dhoni, 3 runs walks across the crease and works the ball into the onside, very smartly, and Gilchrist has to run all the way down to fine leg to field
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run thats a jaffa, 145ks and short, getting Yuvraj jumping up in the air but crucially he watched the ball and dropped the hands as he left it be

Johnson to Yuvraj, (no ball) full on off stump, Yuvraj drives back hard and the ball hits Dhoni's left hand, else that was screaming away to the long-on ropes ... Johnson has overstepped, so we have India's first free hit ... but first, some attention for Dhoni's left pinky finger
Johnson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs full on the pads and he flicks it through midwicket and the sweeper cannot get around in time to cut it off
Johnson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs full and wide outside off stump and Yuvraj laces the square-drive superbly, a shot that will give him plenty of confidence
Hogg to Dhoni, no run looped up on off stump, spins in and Dhoni works it to midwicket
Hogg to Dhoni, no run thats short but Dhoni mistimes his twirling punch into the covers
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run drifts outside leg stump and he tucks it straight to square leg
Hogg to Yuvraj, 1 run spins flatter, Yuvraj gets across and picks the wrong 'un with the turn
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flat on off stump, spins in and Dhoni works it across to square leg
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run uses his feet and drives a fuller one to mid-off, keeping hold of the strike
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 run short and flat and Dhoni drills that past mid-off for a single
Symonds to Yuvraj, 1 run full and flat on middle and leg, flicked past midwicket out to Johnson
Symonds to Dhoni, no run lobbed up wide off stump, Dhoni reaches out and works it to midwicket
Symonds to Dhoni, no run flat outside off stump, Dhoni reaches for it and pushes in the air to cover
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 run still full and wide and this time he drives to the right of the cover fielder
Symonds to Yuvraj, 1 run reaches for the width and square-drives just wide of Clarke at point
Hogg to Yuvraj, SIX runs well he's smacked the pants off that one! Hogg serves up a rank long hop which Yuvraj pelts flat over mid-on for six
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run beaten in flight, as Hogg tosses it up outside off stump
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run flat outside off stump, he reaches for it and defends to cover
Hogg to Yuvraj, 1 run sees the width and carves the ball out to deep cover sweeper
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run flatter one, sits up outside off and he pushes to point for a quick single
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run flighted wide of the stumps and he square-drives to backward point
Symonds to Dhoni, 2 runs walks across his stumps and cheekily paddles around the corner, into the gap at short fine leg ... well played, but Symonds isn't happy
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 run again he walks across and paddles one wide of Clark a square leg
Symonds to Yuvraj, 1 run tossed up on off stump, he gets across and flicks to midwicket
Symonds to Dhoni, no run flat on middle and off, Dhoni gets back and drives to Symonds
Symonds to Dhoni, 1 run full and flat outside off, driven back to Symonds, who misfields
Symonds to Yuvraj, no run flatter trajectory, touch short, Yuvraj stands up and drives to the fielder
Hogg to Dhoni, no run bit too short and Dhoni flat-bats it to mid-off, Yuvraj bolts out of his crease but turns back hurriedly as Dhoni sends him back, Clark's throw misses his target
Hogg to Dhoni, FOUR runs gives him the charge, going through extra cover, firmly struck shot that
Hogg to Dhoni, 2 runs slides down leg stump and Dhoni nudges it into the gap for a couple
Hogg to Dhoni, no run goes for another flat-batted swipe but Hogg reacts quickly and fields
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run this one's got some air on it, so Dhoni reaches for it and drives past cover
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run good loop and dip on this one, drawing a false defence along the ground
Bracken to Dhoni, 1 run short of a length and he dabs it wide of Clarke at backward point, who reacts a little late and misses the stumps as Yuvraj just grounds his bat
Bracken to Yuvraj, no run 132ks, back of a length and Yuvraj drives it back off the back foot
Bracken to Yuvraj, no run a tad fuller in length and he drives handsomely into the covers
Bracken to Yuvraj, no run goes for a big drive again but the bat turns in his hands, so the ball rolls along the ground to the fielder at midwicket
Bracken to Yuvraj, no run shorter length and a bit wide, Yuvraj angles the bat but can't beat gully
Bracken to Yuvraj, no run seams back in off a length, he opens the face but can't beat Gilchrist
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run looped up on leg stump and he turns it away past square leg with ease
Hogg to Yuvraj, 1 run short and spinning away, Yuvraj steers it uppishly to gully where Hussey lobs in a throw to Hogg, who misfields and allows the single
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flatter outside off stump, driven back to Hogg this time
Hogg to Dhoni, 3 runs chaos! Hogg serves it up full, Dhoni drives to Clark at mid-off, sets off, the fielder misses the stumps and gives up overthrows and Dhoni hustles Yuvraj, superb running
Hogg to Yuvraj, no run beaten again, he Hogg flights it and Yuvraj pushes down the wrong line
Bracken to Uthappa, no run good length on the stumps, he shuffles across and plays it back to Bracken
Bracken to Uthappa, no run on target again and Uthappa defends into the covers, watchfully
Bracken to Uthappa, no run a touch fuller this time, Uthappa inches forward and defends to cover
Bracken to Uthappa, no run back of a length on leg stump, Uthappa tucks it back to Bracken
Bracken to Uthappa, no run back of a length again, he gets up and taps it to the man at point
Bracken to Uthappa, no run well-targeted full delivery and Uthappa can only play it back to Bracken
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flighted up on middle and off, defended along the ground to point
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run touch too flat and Dhoni cuts past Ponting in the covers for one
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run flat on leg stump, paddled around the corner for a single
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flights it up and beats him as he goes driving outside off stump
Hogg to Dhoni, no run pitches on leg and spins down, catching Dhoni high on the knee roll
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flatter one spins across him and he just leaves it be for Gilchrist
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run full on the stumps and Uthappa turns it out to deep midwicket

Clark to Dhoni, 3 runs pushes at one and it runs away off the outside-edge to third man, they get two and Uthappa then presses for the third, Gilchrist goes a long way out to collect the throw from Hopes at third man and replays show Uthappa grounded his bat in time
Clark to Uthappa, no run back of a length and seaming away, Uthappa gets tall and leaves it be
Clark to Uthappa, no run gets over the bounce and taps it to Clarke at backward point
Clark to Uthappa, no run fuller on off stump, he uses his feet and clips it to midwicket
Clark to Uthappa, no run on the money, no room at all and Uthappa plays it back to Clark
Hogg to Dhoni, no run flat on off stump and Dhoni digs it back to Hogg's left side
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 leg bye flat on leg stump and he works it into the gap at square leg for one
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run looped up on middle and off, Uthappa clips it wide of midwicket for one
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run thats a low full toss that Dhoni hammers to mid-on
Hogg to Uthappa, no run flat one spins way and he makes a mess, pulling straight to midwicket
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run gets down and paddles one from leg stump, very hard, to Clark at fine leg
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run too straight and Uthappa walks across, turning the ball to square leg
Clark to Dhoni, 1 run slower ball on a length and he steers it to point, calling for the single
Clark to Uthappa, no run tight delivery, on a length and Uthappa just pats it back to Clark
Clark to Uthappa, no run good length, on off stump, and he plays it back to Clark again
Clark to Uthappa, 2 wide slips down leg stump, Gilchrist reacts well and saves runs but he yelps out in pain, looks like the ball thudded into the end of the fingers
Clark to Dhoni, no run back of a length outside off stump and he gets up, pushing to point
Clark to Dhoni, no run moves across to off stump and dabs the ball into the covers
Johnson to Uthappa, no run 140ks, hits the money and Uthappa can just push it to point
Johnson to Uthappa, 1 wide that'll be wide, as Johnson pitches well outside leg stump
Johnson to Uthappa, no run slower ball outside off and he steers it to Clarke at backward point
Johnson to Uthappa, no run shuffles around in his crease and ends up playing it back to the bowler
Johnson to Uthappa, 2 runs again he walks across and chips it in the air just over midwicket's head
Johnson to Uthappa, no run gets onto the front foot early and steers the ball to Clarke at point
Johnson to Uthappa, no run tries to tuck a short one off the hips but the ball gets all tangled up, dropping at his feet as Rohit tries sneaking in a cheeky single
Hopes to Dhoni, 2 runs gets forward and pushes a full delivery through point, calling for two immediately and Uthappa and Rohit do so well too
Hopes to Dhoni, no run back of a length and he steers it to Clarke at backward point

Hopes to Dhoni, OUT ah, a poor call! Impatiently driven into the covers, with too much bottom hand, Dhoni calls for the single but a diving, sliding Rohit is caught just short by a terrific direct hit from Hayden and Dhoni pays for that risky call
Hopes to Uthappa, 1 run gets back to steer a short delivery through gully for another single
Hopes to Harbhajan, no run back of a length and Harbhajan gets up to push the ball to cover
Hopes to Harbhajan, 1 run short one outside off stump and he plays an awkward flick past square leg for one, but kept down along the ground
Johnson to Harbhajan, 1 wide short one down leg stump, Harbhajan misses and a wide is called
Johnson to Harbhajan, 3 runs firm stroke, a back-foot drive past Symonds at mid-off for three
Johnson to Uthappa, no run short of a length outside off stump, 143ks, steered to point
Johnson to Uthappa, 1 run presses forward and dabs this one wide of gully, to third man
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run that one's angled pretty wide of off stump and Harbhajan cant get there
Johnson to Harbhajan, no run tight delivery on off stump receives a tight back-foot defensive
Hopes to Uthappa, no run hits a length on off stump and Uthappa plays it right back to Hopes
Hopes to Uthappa, no run stands his ground and defends it towards point, with no hurry
Hopes to Uthappa, FOUR runs aggressive intent, advancing and connecting well, smacking Hopes over extra cover and the ball dribbles into the boundary
Hopes to Uthappa, 3 runs gets cheeky, paddling the ball from off stump and down to fine leg, where Johnson has plenty to do to run around and cut it off
Hopes to Sreesanth, no run sharp bouncer outside off stump, Sreesanth watches it go past
Hopes to Sreesanth, no run stands in his crease and patiently defends a short delivery
Johnson to Uthappa, no run slower ball off an angle, just 123ks and it beats Uthappa
Johnson to Uthappa, no run very quick bouncer outside off stump, the effort ball, Uthappa goes hooking and fails to make contact ... there's words shared and Uthappa walks down the track
Johnson to Uthappa, no run saunters down the track and swings wildly, but misses all ends up
Johnson to Uthappa, 2 runs thats absolutely drilled back past the bowler, but a well-time slide on the ropes by Symonds and a quick release cuts off a boundary
Johnson to Sharma, no run genuine pace and bounce, 148.4ks, gets Ishant hopping
Hogg to Sreesanth, 1 run low full toss outside off stump, Sreesanth drives to cover for one
Hogg to Sharma, no run flighted up slow, Ishant plonks forward and takes the ball high on the knee roll, Gilchrist and Hogg appeal but umpire Parker reckons he was outside the line
Hogg to Sharma, 1 run fuller and flatter and Ishant flicks it to midwicket
Hogg to Patel, no run quicker one outside off stump, he gets forward and plays to cover
Hogg to Patel, no run flatter one outside off stump and he misses the line completely
Johnson to Sharma, no run short, fast and rising and Ishant chases, missing by a country mile
Johnson to Sharma, no run straighter and fuller and he tentatively drives into the covers
Johnson to Sharma, no run full and wide, inviting the drive but Ishant leaves that one be
Johnson to Sharma, no run full on the pads and he clips just in front of Hussey at short fine leg
Johnson to Sharma, no run beaten by the shorter one, as he stands and wafts outside off stump
Johnson to Sharma, no run slower one slips out a full toss but he doesn't pick it, and misses
Hogg to Patel, no run beaten in the flight as Hogg pushes it through quicker outside off stump
Hogg to Patel, no run sweeps a flat one on leg stump, a hard throw comes back to Hogg's end
Hogg to Patel, no run flatter one spins down and Munaf awkwardly plays it back to Hogg
Hogg to Patel, no run quicker one, 98ks on leg stump, played back to Hogg
Hogg to Patel, no run this one spins across him and he steers it to the man at gully
Hogg to Patel, no run full and flat and Munaf makes room, driving the ball to cover
Bracken to Sharma, 1 run serves up a low full toss that he drives to cover, there was a second there but Munaf stands his ground

Bracken to Patel, OUT edged and well held! Bracken moves around the stumps and gets Munaf edging to Gilchrist, who initially moves to his left but adjusts to pluck a good one-handed catch to his right ... thats five dismissals for him today and he jumps about in celebration
Thats all we have for you tonight. Do join us for game eight. Until then, cheers!
The Man-of-the-Match award is handed over to Clarke for his half-century.

Ponting isn't impressed with his team's batting but thanks his bowlers for turning in a sharp night. He's happy to take the bonus point. Knew that if he got early wickets he had a chance, because India were a batsman short. Credits Hopes for his two wickets. Ponting looks forward to a three
India versus Sri Lanka, at Adelaide on February 19 (13:45 local, 03:15 GMT), now becomes a tighter contest.

Michael Clarke's sensible 79 was the backbone of Australia's total. India's seam bowlers were excellent again, with Ishant Sharma starting the slide and Pathan reverse-swinging the ball well to bag 4 for 41. It all came up futile as India's batsmen failed to back their bowlers. Australia st

So Australia beat India by 50 runs, pocketing a bonus point as well. India did so well to keep the hosts to 203 but their batting just didn't click. Mitchell Johnson was the pick of the lot, with 3 for 42, but he was well supported by Hopes, Bracken and Hogg.
Australia won by 50 runs
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
